trans-unit.source: Specifies the amount in the currency of the reminder.
trans-unit.note: Page Issued Reminder Lines DrllDwn - Control Amount - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies an entry description, based on the contents of the Type field.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the date when the related document was created.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the document number of the customer ledger entry this reminder line is for.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the document type of the customer ledger entry this reminder line is for.
trans-unit.note: Page Issued Reminder Lines DrllDwn - Control Document Type - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the due date of the customer ledger entry this reminder line is for.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a number that indicates the reminder level.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the original amount of the customer ledger entry that this reminder line is for.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the posting date of the customer ledger entry that this reminder line is for.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the remaining amount of the customer ledger entry this reminder line is for.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Reminder No.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the posting date of the reminder.
